Detailed Description

Device profile persistor class that stores in a password encrypted file.

See also
DeviceProfilePersistor

Property Documentation

◆ Password

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorPassword::Password
set

The password to use for encrypting / decrypting the storage file.

Throws an exception if the password does not meet the minimum criteria. Currently, the only criteria is for the password to be a minimum of six characters in length.
